name: Configuration
description:
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: Fan2Fan(Pinto) configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "enable_pinto" as needed to force display. 
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform/target_audience)

name: View All & Ticket Listview support (Pinto+)
description:
[BP-10170](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10170 ) / [BPA-6844](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6844 ) *TM & TDC support (View All)
[BP-10173](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10173 ) / [BPA-6845](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6845 ) *TDC support ONLY (Native Listview)

[BP-10267](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10267 ) *NonGame Events NOT SUPPORTED (View All & Native Listview)
